actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 103(e)(2) of title 23, United States Code, relating to the cost of to certain routes on the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.

summary.text: Provides for the updating of cost estimates of specified routes on the Interstate Highway System based on changes in construction costs of such highway routes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 103(e)(2) of title 23, United States Code, relating to the cost of to certain routes on the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.
